___set_row.description: Updates the row whose id is id with given row. If the row with the same id already exists, the row is overwritten with row (note that this behavior is different from that of recommender). Otherwise, new row entry will be created. If the server that manages the row and the server that received this RPC request are same, this operation is reflected instantly. If not, update operation is reflected after mix.
___set_row.title: set_row

___return.description: True if this function updates models successfully
